alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:23AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Eastland and Comanche Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 722 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Putnam to Rising Star to near Lake Brownwood State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Comanche, Eastland, Cisco, Ranger, De Leon, Gorman, Rising Star, Lake Leon, Lake Olden, Proctor Lake, Lake Cisco, Pleasant Hill, Carbon, Staff, Nimrod, Comyn, Kokomo, Sabanno, Okra, and Duster. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 350. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
